full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 688 Filed 06/29/22 Page 175 of 353 Juror ID: 48 DECLARATION I, Juror Number 48 declare under penalty of perjury that the foregoing answers set forth in this Jury Questionnaire are true and correct to the best of my knowledge and belief.
